Method Detail

getDevicesForPull

public java.util.List<Device> getDevicesForPull(Group group)
Provides a subset of devices in a group which will be used for the PULL action by another component(s)

Parameters:
group - the group from which the changes will be pulled
Returns:
a list of Device objects representing the available devices

getDevicesForPush

public java.util.List<Device> getDevicesForPush(Group group)
Provides a subset of devices in a group which will be used for the PUSH action by another component(s)

Parameters:
group - the group from which the changes will be pushed
Returns:
a list of Device objects representing the available devices

isDeviceAvailable

public java.lang.Boolean isDeviceAvailable(Device device)
Used by other components to check if a device is online or not

Parameters:
device -
Returns:
true if the device is online, false if offline, null if the device is no longer registered.

getAllDevices

public java.util.List<Device> getAllDevices(Group group)
Provides a list of all devices registered for the members in a group, either offline or online.

Parameters:
group -
Returns:
the list of devices, not necessarily order by group member (User)

groupUpdate

public void groupUpdate(Group g)
TopologyService is informed about an update in the group's structure (e.g. members). This will generate updates of the overlay.

Parameters:
g - the group that was updated by the other components

goOffline

public void goOffline()
Invoked when the application is no longer connected to an internet connection. The Topology component will inform the remote services about this change of device status.
